content: Stream created by Sandra Vance.
@Ashley Kras @Faseeha Altaf @Michael Mair Hi there! This is the stream that will be used for the Opthalmology Track collaboration! Please post questions and information here!

Thanks Sandra and and @Grahame Grieve !
I started I private channel "Ophthal_on_FHIR" - not sure why you can see it? for some reason not all could access yesterday
started using slack for sharing links etc

Hi @Sandra Vance - hope you are well -
We are in the midst of planning for the upcoming May connectathon, should we use this channel for communication, as we did last May?
TIA! Ash
